llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Regime A productivity-led path with a baseline tariff cadence around 10% and reshoring capex signaling | Watch tariff announcements and major capex milestones from chip fabs and AI/data-center builders to confirm regime shift in capex guidance and sector earnings signals (SGB2PAZGK), with probability 60%.

Up | 3–6 months | AI capex cycle remains led by Nvidia-powered data-centers with expanding AI-30 exposure | Watch Nvidia data-center utilization, AI demand trends, and capex prints from AI-enabled names and the AI-30 rotation (STBVARD8F), with probability 55%.

Down | 0–3 months | Regime B risk: China retaliation and allied realignment reweights global supply chains, potentially escalating tariffs | Watch tariff actions and sector price action; pace of supply-chain shifts reflected in capex guidance (SGB2PAZGK)(T1QE6JPIX), with probability 40%.

Down | 3–6 months | Policy/inflation shock: oil-path uncertainty and potential policy reversals push inflation and real yields higher, compressing equity multiples | Watch policy guidance shifts, inflation surprises (CPI/PCE) (NL5YYTLF2), and oil-supply moves (T1QE6JPIX), with probability 40%.
